      • storeIndexProvider

        @DataProvider(name="store index")
public static Object[][] storeIndexProvider()
        Parameters for tests. 0 => default store config; 1 => pre-split regions; 2 => spreading byte
        Returns:
        the integer to choose the epgm store to test
